mapper.select: select campaign_id, company_Nm, company_Ph, campaign_Title, recruitment_Num, applicants_Num, campaign_pay, place_Addr, mission, leader_code, u.user_nm, app_period_str, app_period_end, event_period_str, event_period_end, result_date from campaign c left outer join user u on leader_code = id where campaign_id = #{id} and c.is_deleted = 'N'

mapper.select: SELECT c.campaign_id, c.campaign_Title, c.recruitment_Num, c.applicants_Num, f.saved_name, f.file_path, (CASE WHEN type_code = '01' THEN '경호' WHEN type_code = '02' THEN '진행' WHEN type_code = '03' THEN '수행' ELSE '' END) as type_code, c.app_period_str, c.app_period_end, event_Period_str, event_Period_End, t.user_nm FROM campaign c LEFT OUTER JOIN files f ON c.campaign_id = f.target_id LEFT OUTER JOIN team_leader t on c.leader_code = t.id Where f.is_deleted = 'N' AND f.target_type = 'campaign' AND c.is_deleted = 'N' AND c.is_active = 'N' AND c.applicants_Num = c.recruitment_Num ORDER BY c.campaign_id desc
